name: Yield Finance
description: What is the project about? Yield Pulse, a defi protocol powered by Pulsechain offers exciting features to the defi community. The project starts with yield farming as its first feature and intends to bring many features such as incentive pools, Vaults, and its own dex. What makes your project unique? Yield Pulse brings benefits to users not just by trading and farming but profit opportunities through NFT and GameFi. History of your project. launched in july. Whatâ€™s next for your project? we plan to launch our own dex and Gamefi linked with NFTs What can your token be used for? Staking, Yield farming, playing block chain game built by our own platform
